bibl.title: Assimilation as a Criterion for the Establishment of the Text. A Comparative Study on the Basis of Passages from Matthew, Mark and Luke.
bibl.note: Voir notamment la comparaison entre P75, P. Bodmer XIV-XV, IIIe s. (= van Haelst 406) et les manuscrits byzantins.
Wisselink Willem Franciscus, Assimilation as a Criterion for the Establishment of the Text. A Comparative Study on the Basis of Passages from Matthew, Mark and Luke.
